# PW-22-01007737 Invitation to Tender: W8485-227024

## Tender Overview

The Government of Canada requires the following materials for procurement:

### Items

* Part Number: 3-5618
* National Stock Number (NSN): 1560-21-808-4717
* Country of Origin: Canada
* Unit of Issue: Each
* Quantity: 30 units

### Delivery

* From: FCA Plant
* To: 25 CFSD Montreal
* Delivery requested "as soon as possible"

## Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: W8485-227024
* Publication Date: 2022-09-21
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-05, 14:00 EST
* Amendment Number: 2
* Amendment Date: 2022-10-03
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Trade Agreements Involved: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)

## Request for Proposal

* Tender Type: Competitive
* Tender Method: Open Bidding
* Tender Language: English and French

## Requirements

* Products must meet the specifications outlined in the solicitation.
* Bidders proposing equivalent or substitute products must provide the part number and country of origin.

## Contact Information

* Ryan Duncan, Contracting Officer
* Email: [ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca](mailto:ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not specified

## Additional Information

* Documents may be presented in either official language of Canada.
* Tender Description is available in English and French through the link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/21/64f96fac59fbec1fc8fb11f839ab061e/w8485-227024-_rfp-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/21/64f96fac59fbec1fc8fb11f839ab061e/w8485-227024-_rfp-en.pdf) or [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/21/4324e455fdc4becfbfa0213e50647148
